name: DUELS (itch)
description:
Objective:

The objective of the game is to push the other player off the map or into the many map dangers. You have access to a dash that allows you to get a bit of extra OOMPH that can be used to push your opponent further or save yourself from almost certain doom. Just be careful not to get punished for misusing your dash as there is a cool-down. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game has been a personal project that I've been working on for just about a month now. This is my first ever full game that I have ever created and was excited to see it come close to being finished.

My goal was to start a project and actually finish it as I've not done that before, I usually always lose motivation shortly after starting the project and I never see it finished. I would appreciate feedback more than you know as I only want to improve my work. Donations are very welcome as it would help me find time to work on more games like this. 

Thanks again,

Salaro
